"I have and truly first album - Louder Than Love"

That was their second album.    Ultramega OK was their first album.

Wow man, thanks for this great album. Soundgarden was/is (now that they're back) one of the best bands of all time. This certainly was the peak of grunge music.  Really, I wish I was born in a time with great music.
